projects.title: Media Intelligence Platform
projects.description: Comprehensive media monitoring and analysis platform using NLP and sentiment analysis to track brand reputation across multiple channels.
projects.longDescription: Built from the ground up as a scalable SaaS solution that processes thousands of media mentions per hour. Features include real-time sentiment analysis, reputation KPIs, competitor tracking, and customizable dashboards. The platform uses modern NLP techniques to extract insights from news articles, social media, and online publications.
highlights: Real-time sentiment analysis using advanced NLP

projects.title: In-Store Event Management System
projects.description: Large-scale scheduling and event management system for retail operations across US and Canada.
projects.longDescription: Developed comprehensive front-end solution for managing in-store beauty events and advisor scheduling across hundreds of Sephora locations. The system handles complex scheduling logic, localization for multiple markets, and real-time updates. Features include drag-and-drop scheduling, automated notifications, and integration with existing enterprise systems.
highlights: Deployed across US and Canada retail locations

projects.title: CI/CD Pipeline Automation
projects.description: Comprehensive CI/CD infrastructure for automotive industry projects with automated testing and deployment.
projects.longDescription: Designed and implemented robust CI/CD pipelines for critical automotive projects. The solution includes automated testing (>85% coverage), deployment automation, monitoring integration, and rollback capabilities. Significantly improved deployment frequency and reduced production incidents.
